title.content: SEO Writing Assistant: SEO Writing Tool for Optimized Content

metaDescription.content: Provides instant recommendations for content optimization based on the best-performing articles

h1.html: SEO Writing Assistant

h2s.text: Create better content, faster and outrank your competitors
h2s.html: Create better content, faster and outrank your competitors

h2s.text: Improve your SEO writing on the go
h2s.html: Improve your SEO writing on the go
Available Add-Ons
Trusted By
Get started!

content.text:
SEO Writing Assistant
A smart writing editor that helps you optimize your copy for engagement and SEO.
Analyze my text
Create better content, faster and outrank your competitors
Make your copy more SEO-friendly
Improve readability and engagement
Maintain a consistent tone of voice
Check your copy for plagiarism

Get quick tips on which related keywords to include and how to optimize your images, tags, and links.

Assess the readability of your content and identify words, sentences, and paragraphs that need to be rewritten.

Determine whether your tone of voice is consistent and relevant to your audience, and adjust your choice of words where necessary.

Identify all text fragments that contain plagiarism, see the original sources, and rewrite as needed.

Improve your SEO writing on the go
Leverage real-time data and insights based on the top-ranking rivals for your keywords.
Use add-ons to optimize your text in Google Docs, WordPress, or MS Word 365.
Automate your editing process: get immediate detailed tips on how to improve each content piece.
Score and optimize your copy
Available Add-Ons
Optimize your content where its most convenient.
Google Docs Add-On
(link opens in a new tab)
WordPress Add-On
(link opens in a new tab)
MS Word Add-On
(link opens in a new tab)
Trusted By
1 / 5
This is an amazing tool that can be used by both writers and SEOs to optimize content based on their target SERPs. Instead of having guidelines which are then impossible to verify, you have the data right at your fingertips when and where you need it the most. Its a great addition to any bloggers or SEOs toolkit.
Marcela De Vivo
Chief Executive Officer at Gryffin
All of my writers use the SEO Writing Assistant for almost every single article. It basically does in seconds what would usually take me at least 5 minutes. Multiply that by 30 writers and it saved me a LOT of money.
Vladimir Gertner
Co-Founder of Content HotSpot
Semrush has been a huge help as I write copy and build out websites for local businesses. The SEO Writing Assistant Add-on for Google Docs is a game-changer. I wireframe my pages in Google Docs, this saves a ton of time bringing it all into one space.
Joe Garrison
Owner @ClearChurchComm and @ClearBrandStory. Co-Founder @NorthShadeland
Big shoutout to this tool! It does wonders for me - over 100% growth in organic traffic this year and growing! I achieved it by updating all content with the SEO Writing Assistant, improving internal linking and creating new content optimized in the tool. I use the Google Docs extension and then my writer takes over.
Bostjan Tanko
SEO Specialist X-Finity PRO
The SEO Writing Assistant has a lot of features that make the writing process simpler for marketers and content creators. Many times, we divorce content ideation and creation from SEO principles, doing the first two and then later working on SEO. With this tool, content creators can do it all at once. Even better to have that kind of access in a Google Doc as opposed to just the CMS.
Ronell Smith
Content and Brand Strategist, RS Consulting
Get started!
A smart writing editor that helps you optimize your copy for engagement and SEO.
Analyze my text
